item.description:
I will be DMing my first RPGA game and my first game at all in many many years. It is aimed at low level / newer players, power gamers would probably be bored but it will be slower paced then normal.

John McGlaughlin, John Moquin and Jason have confirmed, leaving one spot open.

Feel free to post any questions or what characters you will be using on the adventure.

Please, help me out by knowing your characters abilities. Know any spells you take, how they work and such. Don't count on me to have memorized the DMs Guide :) That'll help the game move faster.

-Matthew
item.name: RPGA in North Kingston!
